item.title: Igor Rostislavovich Shafarevich: in Memoriam
item.description: arXiv:1801.00311v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: The prominent Russian mathematician Igor Rostislavovich Shafarevich passed away on February 19, 2017. In this article we supply his biography, discuss his many important contributions to number theory, algebra and algebraic geometry, and also discuss his political activity and some of his numerous publications on social issues.
item.dc:creator: Igor Dolgachev
